                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Installing SwaggerHub On-Premise 2.x (Kubernetes)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Installing SwaggerHub On-Premise 2.x (Kubernetes)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            SwaggerHub On-Premise is a self-hosted version of SwaggerHub. Version 2.x can be deployed to a Kubernetes cluster or a virtual machine of your choice.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            This guide is for administrators who will install and configure SwaggerHub On-Premise 2.x.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In This Section

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Installation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Migration From 1.x
